name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
description: Gothic masterpiece and one of Paris's most famous landmarks. Marvel at the stunning architecture and rich history of this medieval cathedral.

name: Le Comptoir du Relais
description: Charming bistro serving authentic French cuisine in Saint-Germain-des-Prés. Famous for its traditional dishes and cozy atmosphere.

name: Galeries Lafayette
description: Iconic department store with luxury brands, gourmet food hall, and stunning Art Nouveau architecture under its famous dome.

name: Colosseum
description: Ancient amphitheater and iconic symbol of Imperial Rome. Step back in time and imagine gladiatorial contests in this architectural marvel.

name: Trattoria del Sostegno
description: Family-run trattoria serving traditional Roman dishes. Hidden gem loved by locals for authentic flavors and warm hospitality.

name: Vatican Museums
description: World-renowned art collection including the Sistine Chapel. Home to masterpieces by Michelangelo, Raphael, and countless other masters.

name: Sagrada Família
description: Gaudí's architectural masterpiece and Barcelona's most famous landmark. This basilica combines Gothic and Art Nouveau forms in stunning detail.

name: Park Güell
description: Whimsical park designed by Antoni Gaudí featuring colorful mosaics, unique architecture, and panoramic views of Barcelona.

name: La Boquería Market
description: Vibrant food market on Las Ramblas offering fresh produce, local delicacies, and authentic Catalan specialties.

name: Cal Pep
description: Legendary tapas bar known for exceptional seafood and traditional Catalan dishes. No reservations - arrive early!

name: Grand Palace Bangkok
description: Stunning complex of royal buildings and temples showcasing traditional Thai architecture and craftsmanship.

name: Chatuchak Weekend Market
description: Massive weekend market with over 15,000 stalls selling everything from local crafts to street food.

name: Ha Long Bay
description: UNESCO World Heritage site featuring thousands of limestone islands and islets in emerald waters.

name: Angkor Wat
description: Magnificent temple complex and largest religious monument in the world, showcasing Khmer architecture.

name: Street Food Tour
description: Guided tour through the best street food vendors, sampling authentic local dishes and flavors.
